subject: FW: Website analysis
preview: Hi Amy, Confirming the SEO recommendations from Alban have been actioned as part of our go live tonight. There are a couple of items where they are suggesting more content. I know you when through t

full_threads.body:
Hi Amy, 

Confirming the SEO recommendations from Alban have been actioned as part of our go live tonight. 

There are a couple of items where they are suggesting more content. I know you when through the copy process, so just wanted to highlight these to you. Specifically:

Page 9:
Update the H1 title - please confirm

Page 10:
Add 100-200 words about:
  • Home Staging Furniture Hire
  • Events Furniture Hire
  • Photo Shoot Furniture Hire
Page 11:
Update category URL structure
(This item would require a significant rewrite and affects the backend as well, so we are recommending to not action for now). 

Page 12: 
New pages

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hello,

I am hoping this makes a bit more sense to you than it does to me! Can we please discuss on Thursday after our meeting?

Kind Regards
Amy Smith

AMY SMITH
CEO + CREATIVE DIRECTOR
E. AMY@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU <mailto:amy@huntleyandco.com.au>
P. 02 8310 2285 <tel:%200283102285>
W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU <https://huntleyandco.com.au/>
<https://huntleyandco.com.au/>


From: Alban Guillemot <alban@fullsteamconsulting.com.au <mailto:alban@fullsteamconsulting.com.au>>
Date: Tuesday, 18 May 2021 at 8:02 am
To: Amy Smith <amy@huntleyandco.com.au <mailto:amy@huntleyandco.com.au>>
Subject: Re: Website analysis

Hi Amy,

I hope you are well. We have completed the review and recommendations for the new site. Overall it is good, but there are quite a few SEO components from the current site, which have not been carried across, so we would suggest implementing before going live to avoid any drop of rankings. All our recommendations are included in the PDF and spreadsheet attached

Once implemented we would need to do another check and then work on redirects before going live, so please keep us in the loop when the recommendations are done so we can work on the next steps

Any questions, please feel free to let me know

Many thanks

Alban

On Thu, May 13, 2021 at 2:19 PM <alban@fullsteamconsulting.com.au <mailto:alban@fullsteamconsulting.com.au>> wrote:
> Sure.
>

>
> Ok. We are hoping to launch by the end of the month so look forward to getting your feedback as soon as possible so we can make the required changes. Thanks again for your help.
>
> Kind Regards
> Amy Smith
